title: Have 5 completed referrals but no Medieval Twitch?
body: I've had 5 completed referrals for a couple of months now and I have yet to see the Medieval Twitch skin.  I have Grey Warwick already so I'm just kinda confused on how I don't have it yet.

replies.body:
Weird.  You should write in a ticket so we can help you out with that.  Looks like you should have receive the content already.

Submit a ticket here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
Have the 5 referred accounts reached level 10? That is also a requirement.
